title: HotspotManager
description: Create captive portals compliant with Wi-Fi legislation and collect data.
note: Adipsys HotspotManager : Please read documentation on http://docs.adipsys.com. You can open a ticket at https://support.adipsys.com

env.name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
env.label: MySQL Database Root Password*
env.description: Please keep the password for further use.

env.name: OPERATOR
env.label: Operator*
env.description: Your Company Name (without spaces nor special chars).

env.name: HM_SERVER_NAME
env.label: Server Name*
env.description: This is the hostname that will be used with the domain to generate all the URL of the server.

env.name: HOTSPOT_ALIAS1
env.label: Hotspot URL Alias
env.description: If you need a secondary URL for your Hotspot.

env.name: ADMIN_ALIAS1
env.label: Admin URL Alias
env.description: If you need a secondary URL for your Admin interface.

title: DNSprotect
description: Securize Wi-Fi connection: protect users by filtering malicious/illegal contents.
note: Adipsys DNSprotect : Please read documentation on http://docs.adipsys.com. You can open a ticket at https://support.adipsys.com

env.name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
env.label: MySQL Database Root Password*
env.description: Please keep the password for further use.

env.name: SERVER_ALIAS
env.label: Server URL*
env.description: This is the URL of the Admin interface (has also to be set onto your DNS)

title: LOGview
description: Solution to trace Wi-Fi and handle the mandatory storage of legal logs.
note: Adipsys LOGview : Please read documentation on http://docs.adipsys.com. You can open a ticket at https://support.adipsys.com . Please run once : bin/elasticsearch-setup-passwords interactive to set credentials.

env.name: ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD
env.label: elastic account*
env.description: This password will have to be initialized on elastic.

env.name: KIBANA_PASSWORD
env.label: kibana_system account*
env.description: This password will have to be initialized on elastic.

title: STUDIO
description: Create and broadcast targeted advertising and informational contents before and / or after the captive portal.
note: Adipsys STUDIO : Please read documentation on http://docs.adipsys.com. You can open a ticket at https://support.adipsys.com

env.name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
env.label: MySQL Database Root Password*
env.description: Please keep the password for further use.

env.name: OPERATOR
env.label: Operator*
env.description: Your Company Name (without spaces nor special chars).

env.name: STUDIO_NAME
env.label: Server URL*
env.description: This is the URL of the server (has also to be set onto your DNS).
